doc.title: Outside the Box
doc.plot: 'Outside the Box' is one woman's quest to face the truth and to see if she can get others to face it with her. At 18, director Lacey Schwartz discovered that her biological father was not the white man who raised her but a black man her mother had had an affair with. While this explained why she looks the way she looks, Lacey was left with more questions that, fourteen years later, her family still doesn't want to answer. 'Outside the Box' is a universal journey of self-discovery, of family and denial, and ultimately begs the question- What defines our identity?
